description:
A state-of-the-art set up for tackling big lines. Thanks to the carbon fiber cuff and grilamid shell, they weigh in at just 1,320 grams per boot. The Precision Lock System is engineered to get mechanical thrust from your legs to your skis, without the boots feel too rigid. 55 degrees of walking motion let you take longer strides for a faster ascent. Quick transitions, unparalleled walking efficiency, and wicked ski performance...this boot does it all.

  • Grilamid shell, carbon fiber cuff, and spoiler makes for a stiff and super lightweight boot
  • LIGHT FIT Liner with mapped construction offers a cradled fit
  • Cuff and buckle catches prevent unwanted release
  • Range of motion in walk mode is 55 degrees
  • Progressive forward flex of 130 is ideal for charging steep and challenging lines
  • Light Lock power strap allows for quick and easy transitions
  • 4 lightweight buckles that catch when loosen for walk mode
  • Forward lean adjustment of 12 or 13 degrees
  • Compatible with tech bindings only
name: Tecnica Zero G Tour Pro Boots - Unisex
